original_text: Broadcasts keep staff in picture [intranets] Mark Hawkins, chief operating officer at UK-based streaming media specialist Twofourtv, explains how firms can benefit by linking their corporate intranets to broadcasting technology
original_translation: Mark Hawkins, director de operaciones de Twofourtv, especialista en medios de streaming con sede en el Reino Unido, explica cómo las empresas pueden beneficiarse al vincular sus intranets corporativas a la tecnología de radiodifusión
